burgers.title: Classic Beef Burger
burgers.description: A juicy beef patty with lettuce, tomato, onion, and our special sauce on a toasted sesame seed bun.

burgers.title: Cheeseburger Deluxe
burgers.description: Our classic beef burger topped with melted cheddar cheese, crispy bacon, and pickles.

burgers.title: The Veggie Delight
burgers.description: A plant-based patty with avocado, sprouts, cucumber, and a vegan aioli on a whole wheat bun.

burgers.title: Chicken Stack Burger
burgers.description: Grilled chicken breast glazed with burger sauce.

burgers.title: The 'El Jefe' Burger
burgers.description: Chorizo and beef patty, Oaxaca cheese, pickled onions, chipotle mayo, on a brioche bun. Â¡Muy delicioso!

burgers.title: The Oktoberfest Burger
burgers.description: Beef patty, bratwurst, sauerkraut, Swiss cheese, and mustard on a pretzel bun. Our burger in celebration of Oktoberfest

sides.title: Fries
sides.description: Crispy golden potato fries, seasoned with sea salt.

sides.title: Halloumi Fries

sides.title: Potato Smiles
